text: Javier Porras Santana (born August 22, 1981 in Olot, Girona) is a athlete from Spain. He has a disability: he cannot see and is a T11/B1 type athlete. He competed in the 2004 Summer Paralympics in Athens, Greece. He competed at the 2008 Summer Paralympics in Beijing, China and was the third best athlete in the triple jump. He competed at the 2012 Summer Paralympics. == References == Category:Living people Category:1981 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:2004 Summer Paralympics Category:2008 Summer Paralympics Category:2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type T11 Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B1 Category:Sportspeople from Catalonia Category:Spanish triple jumpers
title: Javier Porras Santana
